release.notes:
Duration not correctly given on disc.
Limitation: 500 copies

Etched notes from vinyl :

Side A :

“The Electric Music Centre is a new organization founded in order to share knowledge methods and secrets in electronic music”

“Get your instructions and go !”

“Watch the subharmonic sound...”

Side B :

“Our aim is to enhance the global electronic music movement by instructing, training and helping interested musicians on their way to become a professional artist”

“Oskar Sala rules... no well-tempered tuning was allowed on this song... Listen to the indefinite beauty of the natural scale...”

“Vocal innovation overload”

“New courses at EMC start first week in March, June and September”
release.title: Zentrum Für Elektronische Musik

track.title: How To Ruin A Song With A Special Sound
